TopicTitle: Non-trusting separation with the cornet engine causes the game to think you have no deltaV/Fuel

Articles.Content:
Reported Version: v0.1.3 (latest) | Mods: none | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: Windows 11 | CPU: Intel 11 cpu | GPU: 3060 6 gb (laptop) | RAM: 16 GB

 

Title explains a lot but here's more:

On separation the cornet engine unfolds but then the fuel indicator at the bottom right, although saying you have a full (green bar) tank, has a readout of 0 delta V. When creating maneuver nodes it says that there is no fuel in the craft and does not allow for the construction of maneuver nodes. Image explains.
